label: Preponderance of the Small
i_ching_name: Xiao Guo / Preponderance of the Small

shadow.name: INTELLECT
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Preponderance of the Small, expressing through intellect

gift.name: PRECISION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Preponderance of the Small, expressing through precision

siddhi.name: IMPECCABILITY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Preponderance of the Small, expressing through impeccability

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 62 shadow frequency. The intellect you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural precision. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from intellect to precision.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your throat. Notice the sensation of intellect.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 62 consciously for 7 days, the intellect pattern will shift toward precision.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 62 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from intellect toward precision
